China on Friday launched this year's negotiations on medicines to be covered by the national medical insurance system, with 168 drugs having entered the bidding process, according to the National Healthcare Security Administration.

Chinese scientists unveiled a newly developed lithium battery that can work in extreme cold and heat during the ongoing China Hi-Tech Fair. The battery can work in a minimum temperature as low as minus 70°C and can also function in heat up to a maximum of 80°C.

The planned crewed lunar missions worldwide have inspired a new wave of research in growing plants on the moon. Chinese researchers found that 3 species of bacteria could increase the amount of phosphorus content in the lunar soil simulant. (Journal Communications Biology)

China's 1st high-power #electric shunting locomotive rolled off the production line Thur in Zhuzhou, C China's Hunan. With a maximum towing power of 1,500 kW, this #locomotive designed for industrial users can travel 128 km while hauling 1,200 tonnes of cargo on a full charge.

#Robot's fingertip feel: A Chinese team developed a highly sensitive robotic sensory system for texture recognition. The system having the sensitivity of human fingers can identify 20 kinds of textiles with an average 98.9% accuracy, helping enhance the perceptibility of robots.

China's Large High Altitude Air Shower Observatory (LHAASO), a high-altitude cosmic ray observatory, has released the precise energy spectrum for the highest-energy gamma-ray radiation from the brightest gamma-ray burst (GRB) observed to date. (Journal Science Advances)

China has selected 15 cities, including Beijing and Shenzhen, as pilot locations to expand the coverage of new energy vehicles for public services. Some 700,000 charging stations and 7,800 battery swapping stations will be built in these cities, a plan released this week said.

The latest data from the National Climate Center in Beijing indicates that a moderate El Nino event is expected to persist until spring next year and may result in the year 2023 surpassing 2016 as the #warmest year since 1850.

China's #BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) has been recognized as being of the required standard by the International Civil Aviation Organization (#ICAO), making it a universally accepted #navigation system for global civil aviation.

China's northernmost #nuclear power station, Xudapu Nuclear Power Plant in northeast China's Liaoning, kicked off the construction of its No.1 unit's nuclear island on Wednesday. The 1,291-MW unit is expected to start operation in 2028.

China on Thursday successfully launched a Long March-2C rocket from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in northwest China, sending China's new-generation #ocean observation #satellite HY-3 01 into orbit. The launch was the 497th mission by the Long March rocket series.

Research icebreaker Xuelong of China's 40th Antarctic scientific expedition completed its first phase of navigation as it docked at a port in Australia Wed for necessity replenishment. It will carry on its journey to China's research base Zhongshan Station in #Antarctica on Fri.

Chinese&Italian scientists found GRB 221009A, the brightest gamma-ray burst ever detected, had caused major upper ionospheric electric field perturbation at 500km above the ground. The GRB was detected by telescopes from Earth & space incl China's LHAASO & satellite Insight-HXMT.

A Chinese research team recently published their significant progress in the field of ultra-fast gated framing technology. Researchers obtained laser implosion images with a time resolution of less than 10 picoseconds, a #first for gated framing technology developed in China.

Chinese scientists have confirmed the #first live birth of a monkey with a high proportion of cells derived from a monkey stem cell line, which paves the way for scientists to use chimeric primates to study human diseases, said a study published in the journal Cell.

#Shenzhou17 crew's #Vlog: Check out how the three new residents of China's #Tiangong space station have been going about their first two weeks of life in space.

The incidence of type 1 diabetes in China is growing rapidly and occurring at a younger age, with the peak age of onset between 10 and 14 years old, experts said ahead of World Diabetes Day, which falls on Tuesday this year.

Lab rats infected with Alzheimer's disease showed significant improvement in behavior after ingesting the granule, according to a study published in the academic journal Nature Aging.

China has started construction of world's largest offshore solar power plant, also the country's first 1-GW offshore #PV project, in E China's Shandong. The plant is expected to generate 1.78 bln kWh of electricity annually upon completion, cutting 1.44 mln tons of CO2 emissions.

A total of 263 tombs, including 237 ones from about 2,000 years ago, were discovered in northwest China's Shaanxi Province, said local archaeologists. Some 878 cultural relics were unearthed, including bronzeware, jade articles, stone objects, iron pieces, and pottery.

China's homegrown time-of-flight high-energy direct-geometry inelastic neutron scattering spectrometer debuted on Sunday at China Spallation Neutron Source in south China's Guangdong, and will be put into use in 2024 to further benefit the study of high-temp #superconductivity.

China's Long March-2F Y-19 #CarrierRocket has entered the final assembly. The new rocket is of the Long March-2F series, China's only manned carrier rocket series and will shoulder #Shenzhou crewed missions in 2024.

China-developed world's largest 18 MW direct-drive offshore wind turbine rolled off assembly line in SE China's Fujian Fri. At an average annual wind speed of 10m/s, a single unit can output 72 mln kWh of clean electricity per year, reducing CO2 emissions by over 55,000 tonnes.

China tops the world with the #largest number of sci-tech innovation clusters among the top 100 clusters globally for the first time, with 24 in total, the head of the National Intellectual Property Administration (NIPA) said this week.

Chinese scientists have developed a new numerical model to simulate the atmospheric environment of Mars, offering research support for China's sample-return mission to the red planet. The study was recently published in the journal Chinese Science Bulletin.

For the first time, a research team led by Chinese astronomers has observed the complete process of dwarf galaxies evolving into ultra-compact dwarf galaxies (UCDs), according to a study published Thursday in the journal Nature.

Chinese scientists have discovered a 190-million-year-old fossilized nest of 3 adult skeletons and about 50 embryo-containing eggs in Anshun, SW China's Guizhou, providing evidence for the earliest known leathery eggs and shedding light on unique #dinosaur reproductive features.

China has recently discovered possibly the closest near-Earth #asteroid to Earth detected by its astronomical observatory. The asteroid 2023 VB2's closest point to the Earth was 33,000 km away and it arrived at this point around 3 pm Tuesday, posing no direct threat to the Earth.

A number of original theories in international frontier fields of geoscience and life sciences about the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau were generated during the second comprehensive scientific survey on water, the eco-environment, and human activities on the plateau: white paper

The number of Tibetan #antelopes increased from over 70,000 in the 1990s to over 300,000, said a white paper about southwest China's #Xizang issued Friday, citing the second national survey on terrestrial animals and plants of China. #biodiversity

A 3,000-tonne-level intelligent ocean patrol ship was delivered on Wednesday in Guangzhou, S China's Guangdong. Equipped with 2 state-of-the-art main engines, the 116.4-m-long vessel can cruise at 25 knots and switch between diesel and electric power systems automatically.

NASA launched a sounding rocket from Poker Flat Research Range in Fairbanks, Alaska, on Nov. 8 into aurora and successfully captured data to understand how auroras heat the atmosphere and cause high-altitude winds.

A large-scale wind-wave deepwater laboratory has begun construction in NE China's Dalian.

Funded by Dalian University of Technology and China Three Gorges Corporation, the Wind-Wave Deepwater Basin is the #first known large-scale wind-wave deepwater laboratory in the world.

China will accelerate research on the establishment of a public data pricing mechanism amid its broader push to promote the efficient circulation and use of public data, according to the National Development and Reform Commission and the National Data Administration on Thursday.

Chinese researchers have built a Low-cost UAV Coordinated Carbon Observation Network (LUCCN) prototype based on greenhouse gas sensors to serve qualitative and quantitative study on carbon dioxide emissions from power plants. (Journal Advances in Atmospheric Sciences)

China successfully sent a new #satellite, Zhongxing-6E, by a Long March-3B carrier rocket into space from the Xichang Satellite Launch Center at 7:23 pm (Beijing Time) on Thursday in SW China's Sichuan.

How fast is China's #5G network? 

Latest data from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology showed the average file download rate for 5G mobile users topped 139Mbps.

The number of 5G users in China reached 714 mln as of Sept, 41.7% of the total mobile phone users.
Show off time! A robot dog takes on the spotlight at a tennis tournament in east China, which not only interacts with spectators but also actually does tasks such as picking balls. #Robots

NE China braves blizzards. #DoYouKnow how China ensures safe train trips even under -40℃:
- Preset track and fork heating equipment to thaw snow and ice-removing cars to defrost the catenary system 
- Precise weather forecast and monitoring along the tracks to avoid disaster

The "Light of Wuzhen" Supercomputing Center meets visitors at the World Internet Conference 2023 in Wuzhen, east China's Zhejiang. This glass house of liquid-cooled supercomputers boasts the ability to calculate at an ultrafast rate of 181,900 trillion times per second. #WIC2023
The US FDA on Wednesday approved the type 2 diabetes drug tirzepatide for weight loss management, making official the use of a medicine already widely prescribed off-label for weight loss.

China plans to build its #first muon source, named the Muon Station for Science, Technology and Industry (MELODY) in S China's Guangdong. The construction is expected to conclude in 5 years and 9 months, making it the world's fifth muon source.

As of June, China had over 364 million users of internet healthcare, a Chinese Academy of Cyberspace Studies report showed.

Internet coverage in China's rural areas stood at 60.5%, and about 68,000 disabled people managed to be employed via the internet on average per year.

As of September this year, the number of valid invention patents and trademarks in China has exceeded 4.8 million and 45.1 million, respectively, the National Intellectual Property Administration (NIPA) said on Wednesday.

The 2023 World Internet Conference Wuzhen Summit kicked off Wed in Wuzhen, east China's Zhejiang Province.
The year 2023 marks the 10th anniversary of the WIC Wuzhen Summit. Since 2014, it has welcomed nearly 12,000 participants from 172 countries and regions. #WIC2023

China's self-developed ultra deep-water ocean bottom seismometer (OBS) has set a new record for China Geological Survey, reaching a depth of 5,826 m on its maiden operation for an undersea seismic acquisition mission in the western #PacificOcean.

China is accelerating the development of a new 20-MW deep-sea floating #WindTurbine, which will adopt a unique V-shape structure with its four blades being able to function independently for height adjustment, helping the device to withstand severe weather in the deep-sea.

'Itsy–bitsy' update: Chinese scientists discovered a new spider species, Grandilithus danxia sp. nov., at Danxia Mountain in south China's Guangdong, bringing the total number of new species to 41 and total spider species to 155 in the area. #biodiversity

The latest and 9th round of China's centralized drug procurement program has resulted in an average price cut of 58% on 41 types of medicine, the National Healthcare Security Administration said on Monday evening.

Scientists have discovered the #oldest black hole yet, a cosmic beast formed about 470 million years after the Big Bang. At about 13.2 billion years old, this black hole is also 10 times bigger than the one in our own Milky Way. (Journal Nature Astronomy)

The first images from Europe's #Euclid space #telescope were released on Tuesday, revealing a stunning nebula resembling a horse's head, never-before-seen distant galaxies, and swirling masses of stars in pristine detail.

Chinese competitors at the 2023 International Genetically Engineered Machine competition (iGEM) won several awards, including the gold medal. Over 400 teams of more than 7,000 students from around the world took part in the competition.

China has unveiled its first compact accelerator mass spectrometry (AMS) with a tandem accelerator length of a mere 1 meter and a full size of 30 sqm — 2-3 times smaller than the traditional AMS, marking a breakthrough in the country's #nuclear #engineering development.

Robotic dogs will be deployed for power system patrol during the upcoming World Internet Conference scheduled on Nov 8-10 in Wuzhen, east China's Zhejiang. The robots will monitor 1,260 spots on the set route, halving the patrol time than manual labor. #robotics #internet

China's self-developed aircraft registered new progress:
- Trunk jetliner #C919 recorded over 1,000 operation hours after delivery
- Regional jet #ARJ21 sent more than 9.6 million passenger trips after 116 aircraft delivered for commercial use
- #C929 enters detail design phase

Scientists have found that Jurassic ancestors of blood-sucking lampreys may be flesh-eating in view of their toothed suctorial disc reflected by their exquisitely preserved fossils unearthed in north China's Yanliao Biota, shedding light on the mystery of the species' evolution.

Italy, France, and Germany on Monday reached a deal to stage the first test launch of the delayed Ariane 6 heavy-lift rocket in 2024, four years behind the original plan due to technical glitches, according to Italy's industry minister.

China will launch carbon-peaking pilot projects in 100 cities and zones nationwide to solve bottlenecks constraining the country's green and low-carbon development and explore paths toward carbon-peaking for different areas, according to a plan unveiled Monday.

About 3.46 million patent applications were made worldwide in 2022, reflecting an increase for 3 consecutive years and reaching a new record high, according to a newly released World Intellectual Property Indicators report published on Monday.

The winners of the 2023 World Laureates Association Prize received their medals on Mon at the opening ceremony of the 6th World Laureates Forum in Shanghai. Hundreds of scientists from 25 countries and regions, including 27 Nobel laureates, gathered for in-depth discussions.

Kaleidoscopic hues! Brilliant northern lights danced over China's northernmost Mohe City in Heilongjiang Province from the evening of Nov 5 to early Nov 6. This is reportedly the first time the green #auroras have ever been filmed in China.

Archaeological work on the #shipwreck of Nanhai No.1, a cargo ship from Song Dynasty (960-1279), has entered permanent protection phase after the excavation work was completed in November. The ship hull has been transferred to Maritime Silk Road Museum in south China's Guangdong.

China's self-developed portable mobile satellite base station made its #CIIE debut Sun in Shanghai. The 13.5-kg automatic device can restore network connection in 3 mins during emergency rescue and disaster relief missions, allowing 30 people to make phone calls at the same time.

A 500,000-kW #PV power station was connected to the grid and started power generation Fri at NW China's Tarim Oilfield, with its annual green power generation capacity reaching 930 mln kWh, replacing 300,000 tons of standard coal use and cutting CO2 emissions by 726,000 tons.
NASA and SpaceX are targeting Nov. 9 for the launch of the company's 29th commercial resupply services mission, packed with over 6,500 pounds of cargo, to the ISS, the agency said on Friday.

China successfully sent a communication technology experiment satellite into space from the Wenchang Spacecraft Launch Site in Hainan Province on Friday night. The satellite was launched by a modified version of the Long March-7 carrier rocket.
A set of concept photos shows planet Theia colliding with #Earth to eventually form the #Moon, possibly leaving two giant structures embedded in the Earth's mantle 4.5 billion years ago.

#NASA's Lucy spacecraft on Wednesday encountered the first of 10 asteroids on its long journey to Jupiter.

The spacecraft on Wednesday swooped past the pint-sized Dinkinesh, located about 300 million miles (480 million km) away in the main asteroid belt beyond Mars.

Chinese researchers found for the #first time that Thalidomide, a medicine currently used to treat bone marrow cancer and prevent skin lesions caused by leprosy, works as an effective treatment for recurrent bleeding caused by small-intestinal angiodysplasia.

An international research team led by Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) has achieved a breakthrough in fabricating perovskite solar cells, with a maximum power conversion efficiency of 26.1%, according to a study published in the journal Nature.

276 ways your #cat is talking! While humans have been found to have 44 facial expressions, scientists revealed in a study that domestic cats can make 276, with 45% being friendly and 37% aggressive. How does your cat make a face?

Chinese #eVTOL power goes global: A leading Chinese eVTOL-maker launched its first urban air mobility (#UAM) center for unmanned electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft in #Europe on Tuesday at #Spain's Lleida-Alguaire International #Airport.

China, the EU, and 27 countries signed Thur the Bletchley Declaration to address the need for a new global effort to ensure AI is developed and used safely and responsibly, marking the world's first intl. statement focusing on concerns surrounding the rapid emergence of #AI tech.

China's first ultra-high-temperature (214℃) and ultra-high-pressure (94MPa) offshore gas field platform, Ledong 10-1 with a total reserve of 18 bln m3, finished installation in the #SouthChinaSea, expecting to see a peak annual output of nearly 600 mln m3 upon operation.

China's iSpace launched and successfully landed its Hyperbola-2Y single-stage hopper at the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center on Thursday, marking a breakthrough for the country's reusable #spacecraft technology.

An international team of scientists from China and the US has made a remarkable discovery, suggesting that two massive objects buried in the Earth's deep mantle could be relics from the moon's formation about 4.5 billion years ago. (Journal Nature)

The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology said in a guideline on the development of humanoid robots that it aims to cultivate 2 to 3 globally influential ecological enterprises, a group of specialized SMEs, and create 2 to 3 industrial development clusters by 2025.

Japan's wrecked #Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant began releasing a third batch of nuclear-contaminated wastewater into the sea on Thursday.

The plant discharged 7,800 tons of nuclear-contaminated wastewater in each of the first two batches.

China issued a set of 5 commemorative stamps Wed themed on the country's sci-tech innovations, including #Mars rover Zhurong, the Advanced Space-based Solar Observatory, and the Large High Altitude Air Shower Observatory. The set has a total face value of 6.6 yuan (about $0.9).

#Tianjin in north China has opened test roads for intelligent connected vehicles (#ICVs) with a total length of 800 km so far, and another 200 km is expected to open before year-end. The project covers complex roads in central urban districts, highways & expressways of the city.

A Taxus wallichiana, also known as Himalayan yew, has been discovered recently at an altitude of 2,850 m in Fengqing County, SW China's Yunnan. The tree, which has a diameter of 132 cm at breast height & a height of about 12 m, is estimated to be over 1,000 years old.…

China successfully conducted its first terminal-to-terminal (T2T) low-earth-orbit communication test on the country's Lingxi-03 #satellite without the help of ground relay stations, hence cutting delay by 50% and making it ideal for polar regions and distant seas. #communication

There were 5.11 billion hospital visits by people seeking medical care at China's medical and health institutions from January to September this year, marking the improvement in the efficiency of medical and health supply, an official at China's National Health Commission said.
3-2-1 liftoff! A group of Chinese students sent their school mascot bear to the edge of space using homemade equipment – at 28,000 meters, capturing some incredible views of Earth.

A milestone! The Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd. (COMAC) delivered the #first batch of two air freighters converted from #ARJ21 passenger planes on Monday.

The converted aircraft has a designed maximum payload of 10 tonnes and a flight range of 2,778 km.

Chinese scientists have developed a fast-charging lithium-ion battery capable of reaching a 90% charge on a cellphone within just 10 minutes. The graphite-based battery has an ultrathin phosphorus layer on its surface, said a study published in the journal Nature Energy.

The world's first floating wind power+fish farm platform finished installation off the coast of Putian, SE China's Fujian, on Tuesday. The project can generate 16 million kWh of electricity per year, equivalent to the annual power usage of over 6,000 households. #GreenPower

China's homegrown #eVTOL, M1, has successfully completed a test flight in Shanghai recently. With a max load of 500 kg, the 5-seat "#AirTaxi" for short-distance air travel cuts 2-3 hrs of driving to just about 30 mins, thanks to its 200-km/h cruising speed & max range of 250 km.

A China-US team newly identified a giant bamboo rat species from 6 mln yrs ago based on tooth fossils found in Shuitangba subbasin, SW China's Yunnan, further enriching local fossil diversity. The species is inferred to be well over 2 kg, and 50% longer than its modern relatives.

China on Wednesday successfully sent a new #satellite Tianhui-5 into space via a modified version of Long March-6 carrier rocket from the Taiyuan Satellite Launch Center in N China's Shanxi Province. The launch marked the 494th mission undertaken by the Long March rocket series.

NASA's Juno mission has for the first time detected mineral salts and organic compounds on the surface of Jupiter's moon Ganymede, NASA said on Tuesday, suggesting an underground ocean brine is reaching the crust of the icy world.

NASA's X-ray space telescopes unveiled a "ghostly cosmic hand" in space. The hand is actually the remnants of a collapsed giant star, which ran out of nuclear fuel around 1,500 years ago, and is about 16,000 light-years from Earth. (Pic: NASA)

Starting from Nov. 1, inbound and outbound travelers will no longer need to file a health declaration form with customs, according to a statement from China's General Administration of Customs on Tuesday.

Alibaba Cloud on Tuesday unveiled the latest version of its large language model, Tongyi Qianwen 2.0, and a suite of industry-specific models. 

Tongyi Qianwen 2.0 boasts hundreds of billions of parameters, a benchmark used to measure AI model power.

China's #SpaceStation derived its name Tiangong ("Heavenly Palace") from Chinese mythology. The "palace," initiated in 2010 and completed in 2022, now looks to expand to become more tech-ready and life-comfy. Relive the construction of #Tiangong!

#UPDATE: The #Shenzhou16 astronauts Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu, and Gui Haichao arrived in Beijing on Tuesday after safely returning to Earth in the morning.

The crew will enter a period of medical quarantine and undergo comprehensive medical examinations and health evaluations.

China's earliest 4-wheeled wooden chariot was unearthed near the over 2,200-year #mausoleum of Qin Shihuangdi, the 1st emperor who unified China, in NW China's Shaanxi, along with a rarely seen 6-sheep carriage, providing fresh insights into early burial practices during the era.

Upon the success of #Shenzhou16 flight mission on Tuesday, Jing Haipeng became the Chinese astronaut who has undertaken the most space missions, with 4 missions completed totaling in-orbit mission time of more than 200 days. #astronaut

The 3 crew members of #Shenzhou16 manned spaceship had stayed in orbit for 154 days since the launch on May 30. They had conducted 1 EVA and livestreamed the 4th Tiangong lecture along with other tasks, laying the foundation for the normalization of space station missions.

#UPDATE: China announced the #Shenzhou16 manned space mission a success after the spaceship touched down on Earth on Tuesday and astronauts Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu, and Gui Haichao have gone out of the return capsule and are in good physical condition.

The return capsule of the #Shenzhou16 manned spaceship, carrying astronauts Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu and Gui Haichao, touched down at the Dongfeng landing site in north China's Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region on Tuesday.

Uranium exploration and development efficiency in China has greatly increased over the past few years, with the incremental resource amount in the past 10 years accounting for 1/3 of China's total confirmed reserves, said an official from the China National Nuclear Corporation.

China's newly-added installed capacity of renewable energy hit 172 million kilowatts in the first 9 months of 2023, a 93% increase compared to the same period last year, according to the National Energy Administration on Monday.

China's #Shenzhou-16 manned spaceship separated from the space station combination on Monday evening, and the astronauts aboard -- Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu and Gui Haichao -- will soon start their journey home, according to the China Manned Space Agency.

Chinese scientists have developed an atlas of high-throughput sequencing DNA damage and repair. The new atlas features a standardized workflow comprising 6,030 samples from 262 datasets by 59 technologies, covering 16 species. (Journal Nucleic Acids Research)

Two cargo aircraft renovated based on China's self-developed regional jetliner #ARJ21 were delivered Monday. With a max load of 10 tonnes and a design range of 2,778 km, they will serve domestic routes to cities such as Shenzhen and intl routes to east and southeast Asia.

China is home to 4,500 #snowleopards, accounting for over 60% of the species' global population. The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau in western China is its main habitat, encompassing over 90% of the total snow leopard habitats in the country, the latest data showed. #biodiversity

China saw fast progress in #BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (#BDS) applications:
- BDS core industry scale exceeded 140 billion yuan (about $19.14 billion) in 2022
- About 8 million road-operating vehicles, 47,000+ ships installed with BDS

China will conduct application research on the modular assembly of proteins in space as a total of 29 kinds of test subjects were sent to Tiangong #SpaceStation aboard #Shenzhou17 spacecraft to facilitate pharmaceutical R&D, according to the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

The control of the Tiangong space station was handed over to the newly arrived #Shenzhou17 crew on Sunday after the #Shenzhou16 had completed all set tasks. Three taikonauts of Shenzhou-16 crew are due to return to Earth on Oct. 31.
Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that the first module of the Russian Orbital Station could be launched into orbit by 2027, as the ISS resources are exhausted.

China expects to overcome the grim situation in ozone pollution control and see its air quality significantly improve by 2060, the time before which the country aims to realize carbon neutrality, experts said at a forum organized by NGO, Clean Air Asia.

The UN secretary-general on Thursday set up a panel of experts to make recommendations in the field of #AI, a technology with "transformative potential" yet also great risks to democracy and human rights.

Scientists grappling with dating the age of the modern Yellow River, China's 2nd-longest river, have made a breakthrough using a quantum technique, finding it was formed about 1.25 million years ago. (Journal Earth and Planetary Science Letters)

#Shenzhou17 mission commander Tang Hongbo became the first Chinese taikonaut with the shortest interval between two missions so far.  

Tang flew to space for the first time in 2021 as one of the first batches of Chinese taikonauts to enter the Tiangong space station.

China's 1st M701J gas turbine was put into commercial use in S China's Guangdong Thur after passing a 168-hour trial operation. Currently the most advanced of its kind in China, it can cut CO2 emissions by 1.6 mln t/year compared with coal-fired power plants of the same capacity.

China has for the first time obtained a kilogram-level abundance of 99% #molybdenum-100 isotope, marking a significant milestone in China's independent supply of this key material with application prospects in various fields such as medicine and basic physics, said its developer.

With a pig's body, an elephant's nose, a rhino's eyebrows&a cow's tail, the magical creature tapir from over 2,000 yrs ago was found in Western Han Dynasty (206BC-AD25) imperial tombs in Xi'an, NW China's Shaanxi, proving the species inhabited in China at the time. #Archaeology

China mulls conducting manned #SpaceMissions twice a year on a regular basis thanks to its fully operational space station on low-Earth orbit and manned space-to-earth transportation system, with a further goal of manned lunar landing by 2030: China Manned Space Agency, Wednesday

The drilling of China's first scientific-exploration borehole with a depth exceeding 10,000 meters, located in the Tarim Basin in NW China, has surpassed 8,000 meters, according to the Tarim Oilfield on Thursday.
As of the end of September 2023, around 780,000 rare disease cases had been registered in China since the inception of a rare disease diagnosis and treatment service information system in 2019.

A Chinese statistical and algebraic topology team is attempting to provide a new idea for analyzing the causes of complex diseases, guiding the treatment and related drug design, according to a study published in the journal Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS).
The three astronauts aboard China's Shenzhou-17 spaceship have entered the country's space station and met with another astronaut trio on Thursday, starting a new round of in-orbit crew handover.

Chinese scientists have shed light on how ancient invertebrates catch and feed on their prey after successful #3D reconstruction of the motion of the large mandibles of Dhagnathos, an extinct hell ant that lived in the Mid-Cretaceous period about 100 million years ago.

With the launch of #Shenzhou17, China has achieved a notable milestone with a total of 20 taikonauts who have ventured into the universe on manned space missions. 
Here is a panoramic review of their extraordinary missions for #SpaceExploration.
China's #Shenzhou17 spaceship has successfully entered the orbit. The manned spaceship will dock with China's space station combination in about 6.5 hours.

China's manned spaceship #Shenzhou17, atop the Long March-2F Y17 carrier rocket, blasted off from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in northwest China on Thursday, with three astronauts onboard who will meet the Shenzhou-16 crew at China's space station.

The see-off ceremony for three taikonauts of the #Shenzhou17 crewed space mission was held Thursday morning at the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in northwest China before the scheduled launch at 11:14 a.m. BJT. Good luck!

More than 20 candidates have been shortlisted for the final selection of China's 4th generation of #taikonauts, including several candidates from Hong Kong and Macao, the China Manned Space Agency announced on Wednesday.

China will launch an extension module at an appropriate time and upgrade the basic configuration of the space station from the current T shape to a cross shape, announced a senior official from the China Manned Space Agency (CMSA) on Wednesday.

A hospital in Shenzhen city said Wednesday that its doctors have successfully completed an innovative targeted therapy for liver cancer, which uses high-concentration chemotherapy drugs to target the cancerous part of a patient's liver.

As their flight mission draws to completion, Chinese taikonauts Zhu Yangzhu and Gui Haichao of the #Shenzhou16 crew captured the magnificent landscape of their home country from the #Tiangong space station. Click to take a closer look!

#China National Space Administration and the National Academy of Sciences of #Belarus signed on Monday a joint declaration on cooperation for the International Lunar Research Station (ILRS), marking the official entry of Belarus into the #ILRS project.

#Shenzhou16 crew has conducted a slew of tasks aboard China's Tiangong space station, incl. 70 space experiments, 1 EVA & 1 Tiangong lecture. Upon return to Earth, the crew is expected to obtain the first-ever in-orbit photo of Tiangong with a full view of its full configuration.

China will carry out its first extravehicular activities (EVA) for experimental space station maintenance tasks during the space mission for #Shenzhou17, in addition to the crew's routine work. (file pic)
The #Shenzhou16 crew is scheduled to return to Earth on October 31 after handing over the control of the space station to the #Shenzhou17 crew, the China Manned Space Agency said Wednesday.
Introducing the #Shenzhou17 crew: Tang Hongbo (C), Tang Shengjie (R) and Jiang Xinlin. Tang Hongbo will be the mission commander.
China is set to launch the #Shenzhou17 manned spaceship on Thursday at 11:14 AM BJT, the China Manned Space Agency said on Wednesday.

The West Antarctic Ice Sheet will continue to melt this century regardless of how much the world slashes planet-warming emissions, research from the British Antarctic Survey has found, locking in further sea level rise over the coming decades. (Journal Nature Climate Change)

Chinese scientist Xue Qikun has won the 2024 Oliver E. Buckley Condensed Matter Physics Prize, according to the American Physical Society. It marks the first time a Chinese scientist has won the top prize in condensed matter physics since the award was founded in 1953.

The opening ceremony of the Hainan Center of China Copyright Protection Center was held in Sanya Yazhou Bay Science and Technology City on Monday. It is the #first and only branch center in the country established by the China Copyright Protection Center.

China's largest vehicle-grid integration network demonstration zone, with an area of over 14,500 sqm, has started operation in Wuxi, E China's Jiangsu. The center can draw unused power to the smart grid from 50 new energy vehicles (#NEV) simultaneously for power load adjustments.

A batch of meteorological equipment was recently shipped from #China for the Sino-#Pakistan meteorological observation station to be completed in Gwadar by end-Oct. The station includes devices covering various fields such as sounding, vertical observation, and more. (file pic)

China's 1st holographic sensing intelligent expressway opened to traffic in E China's Jiangsu, enabling vehicles to run at L4 level autonomy on a 6.5-km section via vehicle-road coordination. The 28-km two-way expressway also boasts smart light poles with laser radars & cameras.

China's deep-space missions will dig deeper into planetary exploration within the next 15 years:
- Asteroid sample collection
- Launch of the country's first near-Earth asteroid defense mission
- Mars sample collection
- Jupiter system probing
- Solar system boundary exploration
A nature reserve camera captured a snow leopard mother with her two cubs, marking the first-ever such sighting recorded in Lhasa, SW China's Tibet.

A Chinese research team announced Monday that it has built an automated weather station at a 5,896-meter altitude in the Kunlun Mountains in NW China. The new station, launched on Sunday, is now the #highest in the Kunlun Mountains.

The China Association for Science and Technology (CAST) has released a list of primary issues in science, engineering, technology, and industrial technology for 2023.

A total of 29 issues were highlighted at the main forum of the CAST's annual conference on Sunday.

Chinese scientists, inspired by marine worms, have developed a new low-carbon building material, offering potential for energy saving and emission reduction in the building sector, according to the research recently published in the journal Matter.

A team of Chinese scientists proposed a new #AI tool, named PBCNet, or pairwise binding comparison network, which may help significantly speed up the process of discovering drugs, according to a study recently published in the journal Nature Computational Science.

China's first 100-billion-m3-scale deep coal seam gas field has been discovered in northwest China's Shaanxi, with a proven geological reserve exceeding 110 billion m3, according to China National Offshore Oil Corporation (CNOOC) on Monday.

As the #Shenzhou16 crew in China's #Tiangong space station is about to complete their space mission, the three taikonauts prepare to keep fit and healthy before returning home. Of course, munching those fresh "space vegetables" is always a welcome idea!

#Fossil of the world's oldest ancestor of gars, a fierce freshwater fish, has been discovered from 244 million-year-old marine deposits in SW China's Yunnan. The new fish species Diandongichthys ocellatus sheds light on the origin of gars dating back to the age of dinosaurs.
China on Sunday conducted preparation and rehearsal of all systems of the #Shenzhou17 manned spaceship at the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in northwest China to set it out for its upcoming launch.

A Chinese hospital has successfully transplanted multi-gene edited pig skin to a patient suffering from severe burns, and the surgery has seen good therapeutic effects, marking an important step forward in the clinical application of xenotransplantation research.

A new study published in the journal Science of The Total Environment revealed that Chinese fir, a widely used species for afforestation programs in southern China, has the #highest carbon sink rate in its middle age, shedding light on climate change mitigation actions.

China had built 3.19 million #5G base stations by the end of September in its push to propel the digital and intelligent transformation of the real economy. Each 10,000 Chinese people had 22.6 5G stations by last month, official data showed Friday.

Chinese lawmakers are mulling a draft law revision to step up the protection of marine biodiversity.

The draft revision to the Marine Environment Protection Law was submitted Friday for its third reading at an ongoing session of the National People's Congress Standing Committee.

Six China-developed solid rocket engines for commercial space programs were unveiled on Friday. The engines, with a diameter varying from 1.2m to 3.5m, can meet load demands of up to 4.2 tonnes on Sun-synchronous orbits. #rocket #SpaceExploration (file pic)

From bionic legs to smart robotic guide dogs, advanced techs take torch relay to a new level at #Hangzhou #AsianParaGames, showcasing feasible solutions to change the lives of people with disabilities. The torch relay that started Thur will welcome 600 torchbearers.

Nearly 580 pieces of cultural relics, incl porcelain, pottery & timber, have been unearthed from two Ming Dynasty (1368-1644) ancient shipwrecks at 1,500 m deep in #SouthChinaSea, proving that Chinese ancestors explored, utilized & traded in the area, latest results showed Thur.

A Chinese-built electric #containership recently conducted a trial voyage in E China's Jiangsu on the Yangtze River. The 119.8-m-long ship, powered by lithium iron phosphate batteries with a total capacity of over 50,000 kWh, can carry 700 TEUs & has a maximum speed of 19.4 km/h.

The winners of the 34th Galaxy Award, China's oldest sci-fi accolade, were announced on Thursday in Chengdu, SW China's Sichuan. A total of 15 awards. including best novella, best short story, best new writer, and most popular foreign sci-fi writer, were presented.

#Shanghai is now home to 88,000 #5G base stations and is working to build an optical fiber network with a communication capacity of more than 10 gigabits per second (Gbps) and develop 5G-Advanced technologies by the end of 2026, according to the city's latest action plan.

#NASA's Mars helicopter is aiming for a new flight on Mars this week. 

The new flight, the 63rd on the red planet, is scheduled no earlier than Thursday. The helicopter is expected to fly about 574 meters for 137 seconds to reposition itself in a new airfield, according to NASA.
Watch this incredible video of the Sun captured by China's first solar exploration satellite Xihe-1.

China's first homegrown large unmanned #freighter, TP500, started mass production Wednesday in Yantai, east China's Shandong. The aircraft has a maximum range of 1,800 km and can carry a standard load of 500 kg.

Ruins of a magnificent building complex from the late Shang Dynasty (1600 BC-1046 BC) have been unearthed in E China's Zhejiang, including a 3,400 sqm ritual site, pottery workshops & relics, indicating one of the diverse regional cultures in the Yangtze River basin 3,000 yrs ago

A newly released report showed China's growing strength in #IndustrialInternet innovation and development:
- A total of nearly 8,000 digital workshops and smart factories built so far
- The scale of core sectors of the industrial Internet exceeded 1.2 tln yuan (about $164.1 bln)

The combination of #Shenzhou17 manned spacecraft and the Long March-2F Y17 carrier rocket was vertically transported to the launching area at the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center on Thursday, preparing for the launch later this month.

An electric vertical takeoff and landing (#eVTOL) aircraft greeted visitors at the 29th Intelligent Transport Systems World Congress in E China's Suzhou. The two-seater #flyingcar, with a max speed of 130 km/h & a max flight altitude of 1,000 m, can carry up to a weight of 160 kg

China has made a breakthrough in cooling capabilities of quantum systems, with a dilution refrigerator independently developed by a Chinese company rolling off production line recently.

Such refrigerators can provide an ultra-low temperature environment close to absolute zero.

China has helped train nearly 100,000 medical professionals in developing countries and established paired cooperation with 46 hospitals in 41 countries in the past decade alongside the development of the Belt and Road Initiative, the National Health Commission said on Tuesday.
An estimated 10% of the dolphins in a picturesque lake in the Brazilian Amazon were killed in a week as a record drought and searing temperatures devastate the region, researchers said Tuesday.

India aims to send an astronaut to the moon by 2040, the government said on Tuesday, as Prime Minister Narendra Modi issued instructions to the space department that include plans for a space station by 2035.

China's 1st solar exploration #satellite Xihe has generated more than 400TB of high-quality scientific data and a range of research results since it flew into space on Oct 14, 2021, said its operator.
The country now aims to launch Xihe-2 into Sun-Earth Lagrange L5 point by 2026.

China will increase the number of joint laboratories built with other #BeltandRoad parties to 100 in the next 5 years, and support young scientists from other countries to work on short-term programs in China, said President Xi Jinping Wed at the opening ceremony of the 3rd Belt…

One of the currently most advanced tunnel boring machines (#TBM) from high-speed rail construction rolled off the production line in East China's Jiangsu. With an excavation diameter of 13.8 meters, the 2,600-tonne TBM will work on Beijing-Binhai Intercity Railway. #MadeInChina

China saw its cloud computing market soar to a new height, exceeding 260 billion yuan (about $35.6 billion) in H1 2023, up over 40% YoY, while the number is predicted to surpass 610 billion yuan by year-end, latest industry data showed.

A recent study led by the National Healthcare Security Administration found that generic drugs included in the second and third rounds of China's centralized drug procurement program were as effective and safe as their branded counterparts.

A Chinese constellation of remote-sensing satellites has successfully obtained high-precision terrain mapping data products using the multi-baseline interferometric synthetic aperture radar (InSAR) tech, marking the country's #first in-orbit application of such a mapping system.

Chinese researchers have completed a digital genetic variation map of rice based on more than 10,000 rice samples, providing a new tool for further study of natural rice variations, especially rare variants, said research published in the journal Nucleic Acids Research.

China has achieved the production of currently the world's largest boron carbide thin film. Having an area of 1500mm×500mm, the 1-micron-thick film provides prospects for the development of neutron detectors in the future. #neutron #ChinaBreakthrough

Since ancient times, the allure of the beautiful and enigmatic moon captivated Chinese people.  
In 2004, China set forth on its lunar exploration program, which was named after the ancient moon goddess, Chang'e.
Explore China's lunar journey!

The distance between #Earth and its neighboring planet #Mars will reach as far as about 2.54 astronomical units or 380 million kilometers on Wednesday, the year's farthest record between the blue and red planets. #Stargazing

Southwest China's #Tibet has achieved #5G network coverage in all towns, with a total of 8,710 5G base stations established in the region, providing services for 1.84 million users, the local communications administration said Monday.

A hybrid rice demonstration project in SW China's Sichuan announced a remarkable single season yield of 1251.5 kg per mu (about 0.067 hectares) on Saturday after an on-site inspection by experts. The demonstration field spans a total of 110 mu.

A 56-km smart expressway, designed for Level 4 autonomous driving, has started operating as a test section near Suzhou, E China's Jiangsu. The two-way expressway features an intelligent upgrade based on two traditional expressways, said the city's transportation department.

The deployment of Haixun 08, the #largest and most advanced surveying ship in China's maritime safety system, will extensively improve the country's oceanographic research and its support capability for maritime industries, according to the ship's chief designer.

A new picture book entitled "First Man" was published on Sunday, marking the 20th anniversary of China's first manned #SpaceTravel. The book relives the historic flight in October 2003 by Yang Liwei, China's first #astronaut to enter space.

3 pure-electric, self-driving taxis have been put into trial operation in Kangbashi District, N China's Inner Mongolia. Equipped with multiple sensors & a cloud cockpit, the taxi guarantees a high level of safety, with a security officer seated in the cabin in case of emergency.

#OnThisDay: China became the 3rd in the world capable of manned space travel after #astronaut Yang Liwei successfully completed an over 21-hour spaceflight and safely landed back to Earth in Siziwang Banner, north China's Inner Mongolia, on October 16, 2003.

China’s #Shenzhou-17 spaceship will be launched in October from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in northwest China as planned. It will dock with the core module of Chinese #Tiangong space station to form a combination of three modules and three spaceships.

40 captive crested ibises are to be released into the wild on the Loess Plateau in NW China's Shaanxi Province, the first time for the rare birds to be reintroduced into their historical habitat on the plateau, said the provincial forestry bureau on Friday. (file pic)

#NASA's Psyche spacecraft launched at 10:19 a.m. EDT today from Pad 39A at Kennedy Space Center. The asteroid-bound probe lifted off atop a SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket, marking a list of firsts for NASA and the launch vehicle.

A Chinese scientific research team has recently discovered a new bacterium in forest soil on Danxia Mountain in Shaoguan, Guangdong province. It is the first new genus-level species of bacteria and the 41st new species that has been discovered on the mountain.

Seven marble columns of China's Old Summer Palace that went missing after an Anglo-French allied forces' looting over 160 years ago, returned to their original palace home Friday, a new batch of key overseas relics returning home following the bronze horse head in 2020.

China saw the formation of its first 5-platform-connected shore power application station with the successful installation of a new electric platform on Tuesday in the Bohai Sea, expected to further realize #LowCarbon offshore oil and gas exploration.

Bionic aircraft "Xinge" (homing pigeon), self-developed by a university in NW China, has set a new #GuinnessWorldRecord for flying 3 hrs 5 mins and 30 seconds on a single charge.
The ornithopter can assist in missions like reconnaissance and field biological scientific study.

China's first cold region electric riverboat has passed ship classification in NE China's Heilongjiang. The smart #boat, about 27 m long and 6 m wide, is powered by lithium iron phosphate batteries with a total capacity of 600 kWh for a max 100-km voyage and can seat 53 people.

Chinese tech giant #Huawei launched the world's #first comprehensive solutions for 5.5G-capable products during the 14th Global Mobile Broadband Forum held this week in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.

#NASA on Wednesday showed off its #first asteroid samples delivered last month by a spacecraft, which is a jumble of black dust and rubble that's the most ever returned to Earth. NASA's Osiris-Rex spacecraft collected them 3 years ago from the surface of Bennu.

China had 14.41 million health workers at the end of last year, 425,000 more than the previous year. There were about 1 million medical and health institutions across China in 2022, statistics from the National Health Commission (NHC) showed Thursday.

The fossil of a shark tooth from the Late Triassic period dating back 220 million years has been found by a Chinese research team during a recent scientific expedition on Mount Cho Oyu, the world's sixth-highest peak, on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.

A team of international researchers including Chinese scientists found that although both are red, red fruits exhibit lower color diversity than red flowers when viewed by birds, according to a study published in the journal Functional Ecology.

SpikingJelly, a China-developed open-source #deeplearning framework, has accelerated training of deep spiking neural networks 11 times compared to existing methods and has been widely adopted in studies incl emotion recognition & energy estimation. Try it: http://bit.ly/3ZT1Fen

#OnThisDay: China's Shenzhou-6 spacecraft blasted off from NW China's Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center on Oct 12, 2005, and took taikonauts Fei Junlong and Nie Haisheng on a 5-day space journey, marking the success of China's first multi-person and multi-day orbital flight mission

China has for the first time succeeded in independently testing the commercial application of satellite-to-ground high-speed laser image transmission. A communication bandwidth of 10 Gbps was achieved during the test using the #remotesensing #satellite Jilin-1 MF02A04.

China's self-developed #hybridrice has been promoted in an accumulative cultivated area of 600 mln hectares nationwide since Yuan Longping & his team successfully cultivated the world's 1st high-yield hybrid rice strain in 1973, helping increase a total rice yield of 800 bln kg.
An ancient workplace of artisan workers dating back to the Warring States Period (475 BC-221 BC) was discovered in Zoucheng City, east China's Shandong Province, said local authorities Wednesday.

China made a major breakthrough in developing the world's first fully system-integrated memristor computing-in-memory chip, which supports efficient on-chip learning and is also energy efficient. The study was published in the journal Science.

An international research team led by a Chinese scientist has discovered musculature fossils dating back some 535 million years to the early Cambrian Age in China, said a study published in the journal Proceedings of the Royal Society B: Biological Sciences.

Chinese researchers have proposed a novel hip exoskeleton, which can strengthen hip adductors by applying active resistance torque during lateral walking, according to research recently published in the journal IEEE/ASME Transactions on Mechatronics.
Relax and dream afloat the blue ocean sky with China's #Tiangong #space station!

A 40-meter-diameter #radiotelescope kicked off construction at Changbai Mountain, northeast China's Jilin on Wednesday and is expected to be completed by end-2024. The telescope will carry out tasks for China's phase-4 lunar exploration program, deep space exploration and so on.

Quantum supremacy: China has successfully set up Jiuzhang 3.0, a quantum computer prototype that can perform Gaussian boson sampling 10^16 (10,000,000,000,000,000) times faster than the world's current fastest supercomputer Frontier. http://bit.ly/3rRBbNB

The Chinese-made first #selfdriving electric bus in #France has been on trial operation in Val-de-Marne, shortening the travel time on the 6-km-long line from 40 minutes to 23 minutes. The #eBus boasts an #AI system but can allow the driver to take over in case of emergencies.

As of the end of September, China's motor vehicle ownership reached 430 million units, with 18.21 million registered new energy vehicles (NEVs), the Ministry of Public Security said on Tuesday. Of all the registered NEVs, 14.01 million were electric vehicles.

Chinese researchers have predicted that the growing global temperature would cause more intense Mei-yu in China's Yangtze River valley region, according to recent research published in the journal National Science Review.

Since COVID began three years ago, the Chinese government has poured all efforts into protecting the life and health of every Chinese. Globally, China has the lowest rates of severe cases and mortality. Average life expectancy in China went up from 77.3 to 78.2 years.

With Omicron less pathogenic & deadly than previous variants and China’s treatment, testing & vaccination capacity steadily on the rise, China is shifting its focus from stemming infection to preventing severe cases & caring for health, which is science-based, timely & necessary.

China’s COVID situation remains predictable and under control. Beijing is the first city to have gone through the infection peak. Life and work here are coming back to normal. We are confident the policy adjustment and shifting of focus will go ahead in a steady and orderly way.

Brazil forward Neymar has undergone successful surgery after suffering a ruptured anterior cruciate ligament and meniscus in his left knee, medical staff treating him said on Thursday. The 31-year-old will require up to eight months to fully recover.

The Zhejiang #Lions sharp shooter Zhao Yanhao suffered a chest contusion and rib fracture after a body collision in the game against the Shenzhen #Leopards and is expected to be sidelined for 4 to 6 weeks, the club announced Thursday. Wish you a speedy recovery!
China’s veteran Ma Long beat Omar Assar of Syria 11-6, 11-7, and 12-10 on Thursday, advancing to the last eight at the WTT Champions Frankfurt men’s singles.

In an eye-catching game of the 2023-24 Chinese Basketball Association season fifth round, Beijing Ducks came from behind to defeat Ningbo Rockets 100-90 on Thursday, claiming their fifth consecutive win.
The Bundesliga powerhouse Bayern Munich was shocked by the third division side Saarbrucken 1-2 on Wednesday, suffering their fourth consecutive early exit from the German Cup.
China’s table tennis player Wang Chuqin beat Liam Pitchford of England 3-1 at the 2023 WTT Champions Frankfurt men’s singles on Wednesday, advancing to the last eight.

The #Shandong Taishan football club will host a ceremony in the last home game of the 2023 season on Saturday to pay tribute to Marouane Fellaini, the captain of the team who played 5 seasons for Shandong in the #ChineseSuperLeague.

The Taxes Rangers won their first Major League Baseball #WorldSeries title with a 5-0 victory over the Arizona Diamondbacks in Game 5 on Wednesday. Corey Seager was named the Series Most Valuable Player.

Pan Yanhong, the 6-time champion of #ChinaLPGATour, delivered 4 birdies and 0 bogeys and scored 68 (-4) for the single round, leading the Zhangjiagang Shuangshan Women's Golf Challenge after the first round on Wed in E China's Jiangsu. #golf

On Wednesday, China’s Fan Zhendong and Liang Jingkun were shocked by South Korea’s Lee Sang-su and Lim Jong-hoon, respectively, in the round of 16 at the WTT Champions Frankfurt men’s singles. China’s Chen Meng also lost unexpectedly in the women’s singles.

The defending champion Liaoning Flying Leopards defeated Jilin Northeast Tigers 106-76 on Wednesday, claiming their fifth consecutive win in the new Chinese Basketball Association season to remain at the top of the table.
China women’s national football team drew with South Korea 1-1 on Wednesday, failing to qualify for the #Paris2024 Olympic Games.

Lionel Messi will not head to China to play, as Inter Miami announced Wednesday that its trip to China for two exhibition matches has been canceled. The MLS club said last month that they would play two games with Chinese clubs, originally scheduled for Nov. 5 and 8.

Tianjin women’s #volleyball club, reigning champion of the Chinese Women’s Volleyball Super League, aims to defend the title in the upcoming 2023-24 season. “The league is more competitive but we are confident to win our 16th championship,” head coach Wang Baoquan said.

Olympic champion Ma Long defeated longstanding rival Chuang Chih-Yuan from Chinese Taipei 11-4, 11-4, 8-11, 13-11 on Tuesday at the 2023 WTT Champions Frankfurt in their 17th encounter.
#WTTChampions #PingPong #TableTennis

Shui Qingxia, head coach of China’s women’s national #football team, was awarded the AFC Women’s Coach of the Year at the AFC Annual Awards Doha 2022 on Tuesday. Under her coaching, #TeamChina clinched the 9th AFC Women’s Asian Cup title in 2022. Congrats, coach!
#SteelRoses

In addition to Lionel Messi's record-extending 8th Ballon d'Or, Spain's Aitana Bonmati claimed the women's award, and Emiliano Martinez won the Yashin Trophy for best goalkeeper at the France Football award ceremony on Monday.
Last season’s runner-up Zhejiang Golden Bulls beat Ningbo Rockets 116-78 in the fourth round of the 2023-24 Chinese Basketball Association season on Tuesday.
Australia confirmed that it would not make a bid for the 2034 FIFA World Cup on Tuesday's deadline day, leaving Saudi Arabia as the only confirmed bidder.

The 4th #AsianParaGames concluded on Saturday in east China's #Hangzhou, yet China's dedication to its 85 million people living with disabilities remains unwavering. Through consistent efforts, China strives to foster a more inclusive society where hearts meet and dreams shine.

WIN OR GO HOME! China’s women’s national #football team will face South Korea on Wednesday and the #SteelRoses have to win this crucial game to keep the hope of qualifying for the #Paris2024 Olympic Games alive.

The National Speed Skating Oval in Beijing will hold the 2023/24 ISU #SpeedSkating #WorldCup on Nov 17-19, a world-class tournament debut after #Beijing2022 Winter Olympics. The second leg of the ISU World Cup has seen registration of over 200 world speed skaters. (file pic)

The 4th #AsianParaGames, hosted in #Hangzhou, east China's Zhejiang, demonstrated its exceptional commitment to providing comprehensive accessibility for individuals with disabilities. http://shorturl.at/twB26
Lionel Messi won his eighth Ballon d’Or award on Monday, and it is the first time in history that the annual award was given to a player not currently playing in a European league.

In the 4th round of the 2023-24 Chinese Basketball Association season, Wang Zhelin of Shanghai Sharks took 13 points in the game against Fujian Sturgeons, climbing to the top 10 of the CBA all-time points leaders.

FIFA announced Monday that Luis Rubiales, the former president of the Spanish Football Federation who faces accusations of sexual assault in Spain, has been banned from all soccer-related activities for three years.
China's Olympic champion Chen Yufei clinched the women's singles title at the BWF French Open after beating Tai Tzu-ying of Chinese Taipei 21-17 and 22-20 on Sunday. Congrats!

Chinese spiker Zhu Ting won her first MVP in the 2023-24 season of the Italian women's #volleyball league on Sunday after Savino Del Bene Scandicci defeated Trasportipesanti Casalmaggiore 3-1 with 25-18, 23-25, 25-14, 25-22. Zhu scored 21 points for Scandicci during the match.

#TeamChina won another gold in the ISU World Cup 2023/24 season after the men's short track speed skating squad - made up of Lin Xiaojun, Liu Shaoang, Liu Shaolin and Sun Long - won the 5000m relay in Montreal, #Canada, on Sunday, clocking 7:03.468. Congrats! #ShortTrackSkating

The Beijing #Ducks forward T.J. Leaf and the Guangzhou #LoongLions forward Cui Yongxi were named the Player of the Week for week 1 of the 2023-24 regular season of the Chinese Basketball Association, the league announced Sunday.

The 20-year-old Cui Yongxi averaged 18.3 points,…

Shanghai Port, leading with five points, held Shandong Taishan to a 1-1 draw on Sunday and secured the Chinese Super League (CSL) title with one round left to play, which marked the second CSL title in five years for the club. #ChineseSuperLeague #ShanghaiPortFC

China women's national #football team clinched their first win in #Paris2024 Asian qualifier Round 2 on Sunday with a 3-0 victory over Thailand. They need to secure another win in the match against South Korea on Nov 1 to enter the final qualifying round. Keep it up! #SteelRoses

Over 12,000 runners hit the scenic track of the Taihu Tuying Marathon in Changxing county, Huzhou of E China's #Zhejiang on Sunday. The #marathon features track along Taihu Lake, China's third-largest freshwater lake, making it one of the most beautiful in China.

The 4th #AsianParaGames concluded on Saturday in Hangzhou, as the Chinese delegation bagged 214 gold, 167 silver, 140 bronze medals, with 521 medals in total, becoming the first country to claim more than 200 gold medals in an Asian Para Games. Congrats, #TeamChina!

China’s badminton pair Liu Yuchen and Ou Xuanyi reached the last four of the French Open men’s doubles after defeating Hendra Setiawan and Mohammad Ahsan of Indonesia 21-12 and 21-16 in the quarterfinals on Friday.

China’s tennis player Zheng Qinwen beat Jeļena Ostapenko of Latvia 6-4, 1-6, and 6-2 in the quarterfinals of the WTA Elite Trophy in Zhuhai, S China’s Guangdong, on Friday. She will next face her compatriot Zhu Lin.
The defending champion Liaoning Flying Leopards beat Shanxi Brave Dragons 103-90 on Friday, claiming their third consecutive win in the 2023-24 Chinese Basketball Association season.

The Israel Football Association announced Thursday that Israel will host its next two home Euro 2024 qualifying matches, against Switzerland and Romania, in Hungary due to the security situation in Israel.

#Hangzhou in east China's Zhejiang Province will be the host of the FIVB Volleyball Women's Club World Championship 2023, which is scheduled to run from December 13 to 17, with six of the best club teams in the world to compete for the title. #volleyball (file pic)
Show off time! A robot dog takes on the spotlight at a tennis tournament in east China, which not only interacts with spectators but also actually does tasks such as picking balls. #Robots

China clinched its third consecutive title in women's wheelchair basketball on Thursday, leading the medal tally of #Hangzhou #AsianParaGames with a total of 393, including 157 golds, 128 silvers and 108 bronzes.

Italy's midfielder Sandro Tonali has been banned from soccer for 10 months over breaches of rules on betting on matches, the head of the Italian Football Federation said on Thursday. The ban means he will miss the rest of the club season and next summer's Euro 2024 tournament.
China's volleyball player Ding Xia, who played for Poland’s club Chemik Police, clinched the Polish Supercup after the team beat LKS Commercecon 25-20, 20-25, 25-20, and 25-17 on Wednesday. Congrats!
China women’s national football team lost to North Korea 1-2 in the second stage qualifiers for the #Paris2024 Olympics on Thursday. #TeamChina will next face Thailand.
FIFA on Thursday released the latest men's world rankings. Argentina remains at the top of the table and #TeamChina has moved one spot up to 79th place.

China’s women’s national football team will face fierce challenges from North Korea, South Korea, and Thailand in the 2nd stage qualifiers for the #Paris2024 Olympics. Still, head coach Shui Qingxia remains confident. “We’ll unite as a team and give our best efforts.”
#SteelRoses

China's Zheng Qinwen opened her WTA Elite Trophy Zhuhai campaign on Wednesday with a nail-biting three-set win over Donna Vekic of Croatia. "It took some time to find my rhythm," the 21-year-old said after avenging her loss to Vekic in their previous meeting in 2021.
#tennis
China's 15th National Winter Games will be held in the northeast province of Liaoning in 2028, according to a circular released by the General Office of the State Council on Wednesday.

Chinese delegation won 51 gold medals, including 16 in swimming and 10 in table tennis, at the 4th #AsianParaGames on Wednesday as five world records were refreshed in #Hangzhou, east China’s Zhejiang Province.

The defending champion Denver Nuggets kicked off the new NBA season with a 119-107 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday. Two-time MVP Nikola Jokic finished with 29 points, 13 rebounds, and 11 assists.
Finals of the Village Basketball Competition of China, known as "CunBA," kicked off on Wednesday in SW China's Guizhou. Eight teams nationwide will compete in 16 matches across four days.

Zhejiang FC claimed their first win after returning to the AFC Champion League on Wednesday. Lucas Possignolo and Nyasha Mushekwi scored, respectively, to help Zhejiang beat Ventforet Kofu of Japan 2-0 at home.

PDChinese.post: 【福建平潭首條“一帶一路”郵輪航線起航】19日，“藍夢之星”郵輪搭載着550余名乘客從全新啟用的福建平潭出發，駛往菲律賓蘇比克港，標誌着平潭國際旅遊島邁入郵輪時代，該航線也是平潭首條“一帶一路”國際郵輪航線。本次首航的“平潭-菲律賓-廈門”國際郵輪航線航次為5天4晚，力爭2024年實現常態化運營。
【中國已與50多個國家和國際組織開展航天國際合作】國家航天局19日表示，目前中國已與50多個國家、國際組織簽訂了150多份空間合作文件；中國風雲氣象衛星已為全球115個國家和地區提供數據服務；嫦娥四號搭載荷蘭、德國、瑞典、沙特4個國家載荷，為中外科學家提供開展科學實驗和技術驗證的平臺。
【10月中國民航旅客運輸量同比增長252%】民航局11月20日發布10月份主要生產指標統計顯示，2023年10月，運輸總周轉量達到110.1億噸公里，同比增長158.6%；中國民航旅客運輸量達到5605.2萬人，同比增長252%；10月貨郵運輸量為67.5萬噸，同比增長37.7%。
【湖南桑龍高速公路控制性工程金家坡二號隧道貫通】19日，湖南桑龍高速公路控制性工程金家坡二號隧道順利貫通。該隧道總長790米，為雙向四車道高速公路隧道。據了解，桑龍高速連接湖南省桑植縣與龍山縣，全長約61公里。項目建成後將進一步打通湘西地區與外地的旅遊通道，促進武陵山西部地區發展。
【湖南道縣：臍橙豐收採摘忙】時下，湖南省永州市道縣的臍橙陸續成熟，果農和客商忙著採摘、選果、裝車、外運，果園一片豐收景象。
【1—10月郵政行業寄遞業務量累計完成1297.2億件】國家郵政局消息，1—10月，中國郵政行業寄遞業務量累計完成1297.2億件，同比增長14.3%。其中，快遞業務量（不包含郵政集團包裹業務）累計完成1051.7億件，同比增長17.0%。1—10月，同城快遞業務量累計完成108.3億件，異地快遞業務量累計完成919.2億件。
【滬渝蓉高鐵武宜段最長隧道順利貫通】19日，滬渝蓉高鐵湖北武漢至宜昌段重點控制性工程——白果樹一號隧道全線順利貫通，為後續架梁和無砟軌道施工奠定了堅實的基礎。該隧道位於湖北荊門境內，全長3023.3米，是滬渝蓉高鐵武宜段最長隧道。新建滬渝蓉高鐵線路總長約2100公里，全線設計時速350公里。
【世界氣象中心（北京）粵港澳大灣區分中心正式啟用】20日，世界氣象中心（北京）粵港澳大灣區分中心啟動儀式在廣東廣州舉行。該分中心是全球首個世界氣象中心分中心，將為世界氣象中心（北京）服務的葡語系國家、海上絲綢之路共建國家和地區提供全方位的氣象預報預測服務。
【11月貸款市場報價利率出爐 一年期和五年期LPR維持不變】中國人民銀行授權全國銀行間同業拆借中心公布，2023年11月20日貸款市場報價利率（LPR）為：1年期LPR為3.45%，5年期以上LPR為4.2%，均與上月持平。

【為中美關係把舵 為亞太合作領航】

——習近平主席赴美國舉行中美元首會晤同時出席亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議舉世矚目、成果豐碩、意涵深遠…
【第二十五屆高交會累計洽商交易金額372.79億元】據19日閉幕的第二十五屆中國國際高新技術成果交易會（簡稱“高交會”）消息，本屆高交會累計入場24.8萬人次，累計洽商交易金額372.79億元。本屆高交會共105個國家和地區團組、4000多家展商參展，發布新產品新成果681項，17個央地合作項目現場簽約。
【烏拉圭總統拉卡列將訪華】外交部發言人華春瑩19日宣布：應國家主席習近平邀請，烏拉圭東岸共和國總統路易斯·阿爾韋托·拉卡列·波烏將於11月20日至24日對中國進行國事訪問。
【中國造船業三大指標繼續全球領跑】工業和信息化部最新數據顯示，1—10月份中國造船業三大指標均位居世界第一，繼續保持增長勢頭。期間，造船完工量、新接訂單量、手持訂單量分別佔世界市場份額的49.7%、67%和54.4%。
【中國國內最大跨度跨海橋進入海上主塔施工階段】19日，中國跨度最大的跨海橋樑——雙嶼門特大橋主墩鋼圍堰順利下放，標誌著大橋正式進入海上主塔承台施工階段。作為寧波舟山港六橫公路大橋二期關鍵控制性工程，雙嶼門特大橋連接六橫島與佛渡島兩座獨立海島，主跨1768米。
【滬渝蓉高鐵泰州段橋樑工程建設全面進入上部結構施工階段】近日，滬渝蓉高鐵通泰揚特大橋引江河斜拉橋首個連續梁在江蘇泰州順利澆築完成，標誌著滬渝蓉高鐵泰州段橋樑工程建設全面進入上部結構施工階段。滬渝蓉高鐵線路總長約2100公里，全線設計時速350公里，是國家“八縱八橫”高鐵骨幹通道之一。

【天舟七號貨運飛船將於2024年初發射】11月19日，中國載人航天工程辦公室發布2024年度四次飛行任務標誌。

按計劃，天舟七號貨運飛船將於2024年初在文昌航天發射場發射。目前，貨運飛船已完成出廠有關工作於近日運抵文昌航天發射場，後續將依計畫開展總裝、測試等工作。
【來了！2024年度載人航天飛行任務標識正式發布】2024年度載人航天飛行任務標識征集活動落幕。19日，中國載人航天工程辦公室發布2024年度天舟七號飛行任務、天舟八號飛行任務、神舟十八號載人飛行任務、神舟十九號載人飛行任務四次飛行任務標識。
【龍龍高鐵福建段進入運行試驗階段】11月18日9時13分，隨著G55504次列車從福建龍岩站開出，駛向武平站，龍龍高鐵福建龍岩至武平段正式進入運行試驗階段。龍龍高鐵東起福建省龍岩市，終到河源市龍川縣，線路全長265.5公里，其中龍岩至武平段全長92.7公里。
【前10個月中國直播銷售額超2.2萬億元 增長超五成】商務部17日發布數據顯示，2023年1至10月，中國全國網上零售額12.3萬億元，同比增長11.2%。根據商務大數據監測，1至10月，中國直播銷售額超2.2萬億元，同比增長58.9%，占網絡零售額18.1%，拉動網絡零售增長7.5個百分點。
【中國首次從摩洛哥引渡犯罪嫌疑人】公安部消息，11月18日上午，公安部“獵狐行動”工作組將上海公安機關通緝的經濟犯罪嫌疑人羅某從摩洛哥引渡回國，這是2021年中摩引渡條約生效後首例成功案例。
【中國政府援阿富汗第二批抗震救災物資運抵阿西北部赫拉特省】中國政府援阿富汗第二批抗震救災物資16日運抵阿富汗西北部赫拉特省。本批物資包括棉帳篷、折疊床、棉被、羽絨服等。10月7日以來，阿富汗西北部連續發生多次強烈地震。災難發生後，中國政府第一時間決定向阿富汗提供緊急人道主義援助。
【2023年前10個月滿洲里鐵路口岸通行中歐班列4157列】中國鐵路哈爾濱局集團有限公司消息，2023年前10個月，位於內蒙古的滿洲里鐵路口岸通行中歐班列4157列，運送貨物44.9萬標箱，同比分別增長4%、17.3%，口岸班列通行和貨物運送量首次躍居中國第一。
【出口剛果（金）首批內燃機車成功下線】11月16日，出口剛果（金）首批內燃機車在遼寧大連成功下線。該項目是在既有成熟平台基礎上，根據剛果（金）當地的運用條件和線路環境，通過技術升級和個性化改進，為剛果（金）國家鐵路公司量身定制的穩定可靠產品，將為當地鐵路可持續發展增添新動力。
【首列“中老泰”全鐵快速貨運列車實現雙向對開】11月17日，首列“中老泰”全鐵快速貨運列車從位於四川省成都市青白江區的成都國際鐵路港駛出開往泰國，一列滿載泰國優質產品的回程班列也將奔往成都國際鐵路港，這標誌著成都至泰國全鐵快速貨運列車通道的雙向暢通。
【高能量同步輻射光源增強器通過工藝驗收】國家重大科技基礎設施高能同步輻射光源（HEPS）增強器17日正式通過工藝驗收。HEPS增強器成功升能加速，束流能量達到6GeV，電荷量達到5納庫以上。測試驗收專家組認為，HEPS增強器總體性能達到同類裝置國際先進水準。

習近平在亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議上的講話（全文）

堅守初心 團結合作

攜手共促亞太高质量增長

——在亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議上的講話

（2023年11月17日，舊金山）

中華人民共和國主席 習近平

尊敬的拜登總統，

各位同事：

很高興與大家相聚在美麗的舊金山。…
【習近平在亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議上發表重要講話】當地時間11月17日，國家主席習近平在亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議上發表重要講話。
【習近平出席APEC領導人非正式會議】當地時間11月17日上午，國家主席習近平在美國舊金山出席亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議。

【國務院安委會決定對山西呂梁永聚煤礦火災事故查處掛牌督辦】記者17日從應急管理部獲悉，國務院安委會決定對山西呂梁市永聚煤礦一辦公樓火災事故查處掛牌督辦，並派工作小組進駐山西全程督辦，督促依法依規、較真碰硬查清查透事故原因，嚴肅追究有關人員責任。…
【「雙11」期間全國快遞業務量同比增長25.7%】國家郵政局監測數據顯示，今年「雙11」期間（11月1日至16日），全國郵政、快遞企業累計攬收快遞包裹約77.67億 件，同比增長25.7%；累計投遞快遞包裹約75.09億件，同比增長30.9%。
【大熊貓國家保護研究中心揭牌】大熊貓國家保護研究中心17日在四川成都揭牌。 該中心整合了中國大熊貓保護研究中心、成都大熊貓繁殖研究基地兩家科研機構資源，聚集全國大熊貓科研優秀團隊，是大熊貓科研合作交流的世界級平台。
【中國15個城市獲批公共領域車輛全面電動化先行試點】工業和信息化部等8部門近日印發通知，在北京、深圳、重慶、長春、銀川等15個城市啟動公共領域車輛全面電動化先行區試點，鼓勵探索形成一批可複製可推廣的經驗和模式。試點提出將建成超過70萬臺充電樁和0.78萬座換電站。
【習近平會見日本首相岸田文雄】當地時間11月16日下午，國家主席習近平在舊金山會見日本首相岸田文雄。http://shorturl.at/aeBCG
【中國72/144小時過境免簽政策適用國家擴展至54國】據國家移民管理局，自2023年11月17日起，中國對挪威公民實施72/144小時過境免簽政策。至此，中國72/144小時過境免簽政策適用國家範圍增至54國。
【孟加拉國首個海陸一體化超大型石油儲運工程落成】近日，由中國企業參與承建的孟加拉國首個海陸一體化超大型石油儲運工程——單點繫泊及雙線管道工程舉行項目落成儀式。項目建成投產後將極大緩解孟加拉國能源緊張局面，預計每年可節約原油運輸成本1.28億美元。
【首對在德出生大熊貓雙胞胎即將回國】第一對在德國出生的大熊貓雙胞胎兄弟“夢想”和“夢圓”本周起進入一個月的隔離期，為回國做最後的準備。“夢想”和“夢圓”2019年出生。根據柏林動物園與中國野生動物保護協會簽署的大熊貓保護研究合作協議，“夢想”和“夢圓”在柏林生活至多四年後返回中國。
【雅萬高鐵開通運營“滿月” 累計發送旅客38.3萬人次】中國鐵路17日介紹，雅萬高鐵正式開通運營1個月，累計發送旅客38.3萬人次，單日旅客發送量由開通運營時的4131人次增至21359人次，上座率由49％增長至98.7％，客流需求旺盛，深受民眾青睞。
【1—10月中國造船業三大指標繼續全球領跑】工業和信息化部17日數據顯示，1—10月份中國造船完工量3456.3萬載重噸，同比增長12.0%；新承接船舶訂單量6105.7萬載重噸，同比增長63.3%；截至10月底，手持船舶訂單量13382萬載重噸，同比增長28.1%。三大指標均位居世界第一，繼續保持增長勢頭。
【中國首臺新造大功率純電調車機車下線】11月16日，中國首臺新造大功率純電新能源調車機車在湖南株洲下線。這臺機車最大牽引功率1500kW，能滿足冶金、港口、電力、石化、礦山等行業內部的鐵路運輸需求，具有綠色低碳、經濟適用、智能先進等特點。
【“拉索”精確測量迄今最亮伽馬暴的高能輻射能譜】科學家利用中國高海拔宇宙線觀測站“拉索”（LHAASO），精確測量了迄今最亮伽馬暴GRB 221009A的高能輻射能譜，並據此獲得了對伽馬暴的全新認知。該研究由中國科學院高能物理研究所牽頭的“拉索”國際合作組完成，相關成果在國際學術期刊《科學進展》發表。
【澳門2023年第三季度旅客總消費同比上升5.8倍】澳門特區政府統計暨普查局16日公布數據顯示，2023年第三季度入境旅客人次較2022年同期大幅增加8.2倍，旅客總消費（不包括博彩）同比上升5.8倍至196.0億澳門元，較2019年同期增加28.9%。2023年前三季度旅客總消費共520.6億澳門元，同比增長2.9倍。
【川青鐵路青白江至鎮江關7座新建車站集體亮相】16日，川青鐵路四川青白江至鎮江關7座新建車站全部完工，並正式集體亮相。川青鐵路全線由四川成都至青海西寧，其中青白江至鎮江關段設計時速200公里，全線共設10個車站。
【漢江首艘純電動集裝箱示範船在湖北武漢首航】16日，漢江首艘純電動集裝箱示範船“華航新能1”在湖北武漢首航，由此開啟漢江航運的電化時代。“華航新能1”能適應長江航線短駁運輸。船舶配置電池驅動的雙推進電機，船長80米級，設計航速18公里每小時，可裝載20英尺和40英尺標準集裝箱，續航可達175公里。
【“您認識這位年輕人嗎？”拜登向習近平展示38年前的照片】當地時間11月15日中午，美國舊金山郊外的斐洛里莊園，習近平主席結束同美國總統拜登的晤談，出席拜登總統舉行的宴會。…
【山東青島：1600噸海上風電安裝平台交付】11月16日，“華西1600”1600噸海上自航自升式風電安裝平台在山東青島交付。這是中國自主研發設計、具有完全自主知識產權的最新一代風電安裝平台。 該平台型長136米，型寬50米，是目前中國國內樁腿最長、主吊機吊高最高、作業水深最大的桁架樁腿風電安裝平台。
【中韓雙方將交接第十批在韓中國人民志願軍烈士遺骸】據退役軍人事務部，日前，退役軍人事務部與韓國國防部就第十批在韓中國人民志願軍烈士遺骸交接工作達成一致，雙方將於今年11月22日在韓國共同舉行中國人民志願軍烈士遺骸裝殮儀式，11月23日舉行交接儀式。…

【緬北果敢自治區電信網路詐騙犯罪集團重要頭目被緝拿歸案】據公安部，近日，為依法嚴厲打擊緬北涉我電信網路詐騙犯罪，我公安機關對緬北果敢自治區電信網路詐騙犯罪集團重要頭目明學昌、明國平、明菊蘭、明珍珍進行公開通緝。…
【長白山小冰雕神似西遊記裡的人參果】近日，吉林，網友在長白山拍到的天然小冰雕神似《西遊記》裡的人參果。 網友：大自然的鬼斧神工之冰雕人參果。
【美國國會通過臨時撥款法案暫時避免政府「停擺」】美國國會15日批准一項短期撥款法案，以維持聯邦政府繼續運轉，避免部分機構因資金問題「停擺」。 該法案隨後將遞交拜登總統簽署生效。
【加州州長向習近平贈送金州勇士隊球衣】當地時間11月15日晚，國家主席習近平在美國舊金山出席美國友好團體聯合舉行的歡迎宴會。 宴會開始前，加州州長紐森向習近平贈送了一件金州勇士隊球衣。
【1-10月中國對外非金融類直接投資同比增長17.3%】據商務部16日介紹，2023年1-10月，中國對外投資持續增長，對外非金融類直接投資7362億元人民幣，同比增長17.3%。其中，中國企業在“一帶一路”共建國家非金融類直接投資1816.9億元人民幣，同比增長27%。

【面向歐洲及東南亞 “絲路海運”海鐵新能源產品專列首發】載着新能源產品的中歐班列長安號，15日從陝西西安國際港站啟程，將駛往浙江寧波舟山港進行轉運，並向歐洲和東南亞主要港口進行分撥。這標誌着西安國際港—寧波舟山港“絲路海運”新能源產品專列開行。其中，至東南亞運輸全程大約需要10天時間。
【中國全國現有濕地約5635萬公頃】近日召開的全國濕地保護管理座談會公布：目前，中國全國濕地面積約為5635萬公頃，有82處國際重要濕地（其中香港1處）、58處國家重要濕地、903處國家濕地公園、13個國際濕地城市，全國濕地保護體系初步建立。
【粵港澳大灣區首個百萬千瓦級海上風電項目正式併網】近日，廣東惠州港口二海上風電項目首臺風機併網，為2023年內項目全容量投運奠定了基礎。該項目是粵港澳大灣區首個百萬千瓦級海上風電項目，全部建成投產後，預計每年可提供清潔電能約30億度，等效節省標煤約100萬噸，減少二氧化碳排放量約235萬噸。
【粵港澳大灣區“大國重器”上新】位於廣東深圳光明科學城的腦解析與腦模擬重大科技基礎設施、合成生物研究重大科技基礎設施兩個大科學裝置15日正式投入使用，有望進一步匯聚全球高端科研資源，為大灣區基礎研究提供支撐。其所在的光明科學城是粵港澳大灣區綜合性國家科學中心先行啟動區的重要組成部分。
【湖北武陽高速全線通車】湖北武漢至陽新高速公路全線16日正式建成通車。至此，武漢至大冶車程縮短至40分鐘，武漢至陽新車程縮短至1小時，將推動長江中游城市群區域協調一體化發展。武陽高速線路全長126公里，雙向四至六車道。黃石段作為最長的路段，全長91.308公里，設計時速100公里。
【習近平：首先要回答的是中美到底是對手還是夥伴】當地時間11月15日晚，習近平主席出席美國友好團體聯合舉辦的歡迎宴會並發表演講。…
【中國成功發射新一代海洋水色觀測衛星】11月16日，中國在酒泉衛星發射中心用長征二號丙基礎級和遠征一號S上面級組成的運載火箭，成功發射新一代海洋水色觀測衛星海洋三號01星。該衛星指標達到國際同類先進水平，可滿足中國海洋環境監測的主體業務需求。此次任務是長征系列運載火箭第497次發射。
【香港旅發局：預計2023年訪港旅客將超3000萬人次】香港旅遊發展局15日公布數據，2023年1月至10月錄得約2680萬訪港旅客人次。10月初步統計訪港旅客數字約346萬人次，其中內地訪港旅客約270萬人次。旅發局表示，接下來的一連串活動將吸引更多旅客訪港，預計2023年全年訪港旅客將超過3000萬人次。
【甘肅敦煌：雪後大漠景如畫】受冷空氣影響，11月14日晚，甘肅省敦煌市迎來入冬以來的首場降雪。雪後的甘肅省敦煌市鳴沙山月牙泉景區銀裝素裹，景色如畫，美不勝收。遊客踏雪而來，欣賞雪景，拍照打卡，感受大漠里難得一遇的雪後美景。
【湖北武漢陽邏港至越南凱萊港國際近洋直航首航】15日，一輛載運著268標箱物品的班輪從湖北武漢陽邏港出發，駛往越南凱萊港。這標誌著武漢—越南直航航線順利首航，湖北再添一條“出海”新通道。據了解，該直航航線長達2350海里，往返20天。與傳統運輸模式相比，該航線可節省物流時間3天。
【國家能源局：2023年10月份中國全社會用電量同比增長8.4%】國家能源局15日發布數據顯示，2023年10月份，中國全社會用電量7419億千瓦時，同比增長8.4%。1—10月，中國全社會用電量累計76059億千瓦時，同比增長5.8%。
【遼寧徐大堡核電站1號機組核島工程全面開工】位於遼寧省葫蘆島市的徐大堡核電站1號機組核島工程15日全面開工。據介紹，徐大堡核電站1號機組裝機額定容量為129.1萬千瓦，設計運行壽命為60年。徐大堡核電項目全部建成後，每年可提供近540億千瓦時的清潔能源。
【前10個月中國全國一般公共預算收入同比增長8.1%】財政部15日發布的數據顯示，1—10月累計，中國全國一般公共預算收入187494億元，同比增長8.1%。其中，稅收收入157841億元，同比增長10.7%；非稅收入29653億元，同比下降3.8%。1—10月累計，全國一般公共預算支出215734億元，同比增長4.6%。
【舊金山斐洛里莊園：習近平同拜登道別】當地時間11月15日下午，中美元首會晤結束後，拜登總統將習近平主席送至上車處，相互道別。
【習近平同拜登散步交談】當地時間11月15日下午，宴會後，習近平主席同拜登總統在斐洛里莊園散步交談。
【習近平同美國總統拜登舉行中美元首會晤】當地時間11月15日，國家主席習近平在美國舊金山斐洛里莊園同美國總統拜登舉行中美元首會晤。兩國元首就事關中美關係的戰略性、全局性、方向性問題以及事關世界和平和發展的重大問題坦誠深入地交換了意見。…

【習近平：大國競爭不是這個時代的底色】當地時間11月15日，國家主席習近平在美國舊金山斐洛里莊園同美國總統拜登舉行中美元首會晤。
